EVENT_GREATRIVER_START_DESC:
Welcome to this custom map.

In Great River, saplings and bushes yield less wood than a full-sized tree.

Berry bushes are scattered over the landscape, and can also be planted by the forester.

Stone is mined from scattered, non-renewable deposits. You'll need to build new stone mining camps as you deplete stone in each area.

Feel free to contact me on Discord if you have any questions!

Batyushki
